strongppbrppstrongTop Skills AWS and Monitoring tools and Development experience in NodejsstrongppstrongJob DescriptionstrongppAs a site reliability engineer you will be focused on maximum availability observability reliability security and performance for client Digital ExperiencesppbrppSREs perform deep problem analysis detect infrastructure or code defects define report and create observability processes for Key Performance Indicators KPIs and work with product delivery teams to provide long term solutions to production issuesppbrppWe are looking for talented and passionate full stack developers with knowledge of datacentre infrastructure and cloud platforms who can bring the followingppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspAbility to observe diagnose and develop fixes for production issues quickly and efficiently ppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspAbility to develop and drive real time monitoring solutions that provide visibility into site health and key performance indicatorsppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspStrong communication skills written and verbal They must be able to clearly articulate issues and their impactsppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspWorking understanding of IT service management Incident Problem Change and Knowledge managementppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspAbility to work across teams business and technical to continuously analyse system performance in production troubleshoot consumer reported issues and proactively identify areas in need of optimizationppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspPractical experience in application reliability practicesproduction support for consumer facing web andor mobile experiences or a strong technical skill set combined with a desire to learnppbrppQualificationsSkillsppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspBachelors degree in Computer Science Information Systems Business or other relevant subject areappnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspBasic understanding of DNS Networking Virtualization LinuxppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspExpertise in designingbuildingsupporting scalable cloudbased Micro Services preferredppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspDesign and development experience with a modern language like Java preferredppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspProficiency with JavaScript on frontend React Angular etc and backend Nodejs components preferredppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspExperience in other modern enterprise languages functional or other  Scala Python Golang etc is a plusppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspExperience with NoSQL databases like DynamoDB Cassandra etc a plusppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspGood understanding of RESTful APIs ppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspBasic understanding of common tools for service management agile and observability ServiceNow Jira Jenkins Splunk New Relic SignalFXppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspBackground with ITIL or Lean a plusp
